0: Cluster 0 (111 pitchers) — Mid-Velocity Sinker Arm: average FF velocity (94.0 mph, -0.1 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2270 rpm, -12). Arsenal: leans heavily on the sinker (34%, +18%), and avoids the four-seamer (-13%).
